name: s62_the_red_thread_
description: Thematic virtual "Red Thread" is an immersive and social venue of conspiracy thinkers. It can be applied to the purpose of authentication, producing evidence for a broad range of conspiracy theories and collaboratively as a means for spreading evidence among a group of users. As redundancy evidence continues to mount, the can remove redundancy, resulting in clarity and intelligibility. When theories are found to intersect based on evidence, a "red thread" visually connects them, creating an intricate web of interconnected ideas.
